article_title: Amanda Carpenter notices something strange about Sunday shows’ coverage of Ted Cruz – twitchy.com
article_text:
Two networks independently bashing a conservative with the same talking point? What a shocker.

@amandacarpenter I'd throw up if I had to eat with most of the GOP delegation — bobby parnell (@bdp514am) February 16, 2014

That wouldn't happen after Chris Wallace completely exposed Republicans for trying to plant oppo on Cruz for Sunday shows… — Amanda Carpenter (@amandacarpenter) February 16, 2014

Anyway, Cruz didn't come to Washington to make friends in the club. He came to stop the games and help save America. It's. all. good. — Amanda Carpenter (@amandacarpenter) February 16, 2014

Indeed.

https://twitter.com/ChuckNorton1/status/435119159857270785
